ANALYSIS.NAME: CEC_BACL2_V
ANALYSIS.DESCRIPTION: Bepaling van CEC-BaCl2 en extract voor eventueel de bepaling van vrije zuurheid (CEC_ACID_EXCH_V) en protonen (CEC_H_EXCH_V)

CALCULATION.SOURCE_CODE:
'breakpoint()
' 1. Default value 'Gewicht" voor PBL en QC-samples, default = 10 gram sampletype = select sample.sample_type If ((sampletype = "PRBLANCO") or (sampletype = "CONTROL")) then Gewicht = 10 Return Gewicht Endif
' 2. Bepalen van het percentage koolstof uit LOI, TOC of TC 'breakpoint() IF (NotEmpty(LOI)) THEN OC = LOI / 20 ENDIF
IF (NotEmpty(OCJena)) THEN OC = OCJena / 10 ENDIF
IF (NotEmpty(TCSkalar)) THEN OC = TCSkalar / 10 ENDIF
if (isEmpty(OC) or OC = "OC") then 'MsgBox("OC niet gekend") endif
'MsgBox(OC)
'3. Gewicht voor stalen op basis van organisch koolstofgehalte if (IsNumeric(OC)) then If (OC < 2.5) then Gewicht = 10 Elseif (OC > 2.5) and (OC < 4.5) then Gewicht = 5 ELSE Gewicht = 2 ENDIF
Return Gewicht ELSE RETURN endif

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (4008 / 100) / 2 Vextract = 100
Ca_cmol = (CA * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return Ca_cmol

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (3910 / 100) / 1 Vextract = 100
K_cmol = (K * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return K_cmol

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (2431 / 100) / 2 Vextract = 100
Mg_cmol = (MG * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return Mg_cmol

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (2299 / 100) / 1 Vextract = 100
Na_cmol = (NA * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return Na_cmol

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (2698 / 100) / 3 Vextract = 100
Al_cmol = (AL * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return Al_cmol

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (5580 / 100) / 2 Vextract = 100
Fe_cmol = (FE * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return Fe_cmol

'omrekening van mg/l naar cmol(+)/kg'
EM = (5494 / 100) / 2 Vextract = 100
Mn_cmol = (MN * Vextract) / (Gewicht * EM * 10)
return MN_cmol

'berekenen van de berekende CEC'
'productGrade = select sample.product_grade 'if (productGrade = "ICP_BACL2_MIX_RF") then 'geen berekening uitvoeren voor de RF-Mix ' CEC_BACL2 = 0 ' Return CEC_BACL2 ' endif
CEC_BACL2 = Na + K + Mg + Ca + Al + Fe + Mn
Return CEC_BACL2

' Berekenen van de CEC na verdringing met MgSO4
EM = 24305 / 1000 / 2 ' equivalentmassa van Mg
FactorBL = (MgBL / EM / 10) ' concentratie PBL in cmol/l FactorST = (MgST / EM / 10) * (((Gna - Gvoor) + 30) / 30) ' concentratie staal in cmol/l gecorrigeerd voor volumeverlies extractie
CEC_BaCl2 = (FactorBL - FactorST) * 30 / Gstaal 'rekening houdend met 100 ml extract
Return CEC_BaCl2

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
Ca_DS = (Ca / DS105) * 1000 Return Ca_DS

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
K_DS = (K / DS105) * 1000 Return K_DS

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
Mg_DS = (MG / DS105) * 1000 Return Mg_DS

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
Na_DS = (NA / DS105) * 1000 Return Na_DS

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
Al_DS = (AL / DS105) * 1000 Return Al_DS

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
Fe_DS = (FE / DS105) * 1000 Return Fe_DS

' omrekenen van mg/kg naar mg/kg DS originalSample = select sample.original_sample
sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
Mn_DS = (MN / DS105) * 1000 Return Mn_DS

' omrekenen naar droge stof
originalSample = select sample.original_sample sampletype = select sample.sample_type where sample_number = originalSample order by sample_number AnalysisName = "DS_OVEN_105" AnalysisComp = "DS.105" DS105 = select result.numeric_entry where sample_number = originalSample and analysis = AnalysisName and name = AnalysisComp order by sample_number
if (isNull(sampletype) or (sampletype = "DUP")) then if (isEmpty(DS105)) then RETURN endif else Subroutine("FN_COMPCALC_DS_CORRECT") 'returns dscorrectie DS105 = 1000 * dscorrectie endif
CEC_DS = (CEC / DS105) * 1000 Return CEC_DS
